admin.description: Optional Admin with the ability to execute DAO messages directly. Useful for building SubDAOs controlled by a parent DAO. If no admin is specified the contract is set as its own admin so that the admin may be updated later by governance.

automatically_add_cw20s.description: If true the contract will automatically add received cw20 tokens to its treasury.

automatically_add_cw721s.description: If true the contract will automatically add received cw721 tokens to its treasury.

dao_uri.description: Implements the DAO Star standard: https://daostar.one/EIP

description.description: A description of the core contract.

image_url.description: An image URL to describe the core module contract.

initial_items.description: Initial information for arbitrary contract addresses to be added to the items map. The key is the name of the item in the items map. The value is an enum that either uses an existing address or instantiates a new contract.

name.description: The name of the core contract.

proposal_modules_instantiate_info.description: Instantiate information for the core contract's proposal modules.

voting_module_instantiate_info.description: Instantiate information for the core contract's voting power module.

Admin.description: Information about the CosmWasm level admin of a contract. Used in conjunction with `ModuleInstantiateInfo` to instantiate modules.

oneOf.description: Set the admin to a specified address.
Sets the admin as the core module address.

Binary.description:
Binary is a wrapper around Vec<u8> to add base64 de/serialization with serde. It also adds some helper methods to help encode inline.

This is only needed as serde-json-{core,wasm} has a horrible encoding for Vec<u8>. See also <https://github.com/CosmWasm/cosmwasm/blob/main/docs/MESSAGE_TYPES.md>.

InitialItem.description: Information about an item to be stored in the items list.

value.description: The value the item will have at instantiation time.

ModuleInstantiateInfo.description: Information needed to instantiate a module.

admin.description: CosmWasm level admin of the instantiated contract. See: <https://docs.cosmwasm.com/docs/1.0/smart-contracts/migration>

code_id.description: Code ID of the contract to be instantiated.

msg.description: Instantiate message to be used to create the contract.
